coded_answer.p: Thank you for your letter letting me know that I've won first prize in your competition. It came as a nice surprise.

I would like to let you know that I can only travel in July because that is the only time I can take leaveoff from work. I would prefer to stay in the log cabins as I would be afraid of insects or any crawling animals if I havehad to stay in the tent.

For activities choices, I would like to choose Tennis and swimming. I used to play Tennis at tournament level and now I play it for enjoyment instead. Swimming is my bestfavourite way of excerciseexerciseexercising and keeping fit.

I've a few questions to ask. Since all accommodation and travel costs are paid for, Areare there any other expenses that I have to paymeet? How much money I shouldshould I have with me in order to cover all other expenses? Furthermore, what type of clothes I shouldshould I bring?
I would be grateful if you could let me knowhave the above information as soon as possible. Thank you once again for giving me this good news!
